content: 42 sts in stockinette stitch on 3mm needles gauge is not critical for this pattern row 13 purl bridge of snout row 14 k16 k1 lift the 2nd stitch on the right- abbreviations hand needle over the 1st stitch on the right-hand k knit needle 12 times k14 30 sts k2tog knit two stitches together decrease by 1 ⇨ note after working row 14 you should have kfb knit into front and back increase by 1 two groups of 15 sts on the needle with a cast off gap in between slide the two sets of sts together p purl and work across all 30 sts for the next row for the repeat repeat top of the head rs right side top of head ssk slip the next stitch knit-wise slip the next row 15 to 19 starting on a ws purl row work 5 stitch purl-wise knit through the front of row in st st 30 sts the 2 slipped sts decrease by 1 row 20 k1 k2 k2tog 7 times k1 23 sts st s stitch es row 21 purl st st stockinette row 22 k1 k1 k2tog 7 times k1 16 sts ws wrong side row 23 purl loyal puppy copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 2 of 4 row 24 k1 k2tog 7 times k1 9 sts tail make 1 start at the base cast on 6 sts in brown on pull through to cast off 3mm needles row 1 to 7 starting on a ws purl row work 7 row body in st st make 1 start at the back cast on 8 sts in brown on pull through to cast off 3mm needles row 1 ws purl feet row 2 rs k1 kfb 7 times 15 sts make 4 start at the top edge cast on 10 sts in row 3 purl brown on 3mm needles row 4 k1 kfb k1 7 times 22 sts row 1 to 5 starting on a ws purl row work 5 row row 5 purl in st st row 6 k1 kfb k2 7 times 29 sts row 6 k2 kfb 6 times k2 16 sts row 7 to 35 starting on a ws purl row work 29 row 7 to 11 starting on a ws purl row work 5 row in st st row in st st row 36 k1 k2tog k2 7 times 22 sts row 12 k2tog 8 times 8 sts row 37 purl pull through to cast off row 38 k1 k2tog k1 7 times 15 sts row 39 purl collar row 40 k1 k2tog 7 times 7 sts make 1 cast on 20 sts in blue on 3mm needles pull through to cast off row 1 knit cast off all sts ears make 2 start at the bottom edge cast on 6 sts in brown on 3mm needles row 1 knit row 2 k1 kfb knit to end 7 sts row 3 to 5 repeat row 2 three more times 10 sts row
